alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 9:53PM EST until March 15 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River, White River, Driftwood River. .Ongoing flooding will continue along portions of the East Fork White, White, and Wabash Rivers and their tributaries. River stages are rising again due to previous rainfall over the weekend. Minor flooding is largely expected, which primarily impacts river roads, parks, and agricultural land. The crest on the Wabash River is between Lafayette and Covington. The crest on the White River is near Spencer. The crest on the East Fork White River is between Seymour and Rivervale. New precipitation amounts through the weekend will not impact current flooding. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING TO TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River at Williams. * WHEN...From Thursday evening to Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, Campground begins to flood at Williams Dam. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to 9.6 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning to 6.2 feet and begin rising again early Wednesday afternoon. It will rise to 6.3 feet Wednesday evening. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued Thursday morning by around 1100 AM EST /1000 AM CST/.
